Mincer: Will this lead us out of the desert?...

  ----- Original Message -=
----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunday, Augus=
t 04, 2002 1:59 AM
  Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


        Skull=
etron glared at Terminion sinisterly, and  then looked forward and continue=
d walking...

        -------Original Message-------

        From: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
        Date: August 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
        To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
        Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

        T=
erminion stares.

        Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

        =
He looked at the other 4.

        Monster: Grr.

        Terminion: Okay. =
Let's go.

        They follow Skulletron. Who knows why? They just do...

=
          ----- Original Message -----
          From: LurkerAbyss
        =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:32 A=
M
          Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                Skulle=
tron looked at the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at their =
feet.

                Skulletron:  I've seen too much.  You follow me.  Or=
 else, I will devour you.  And I'm not kidding.  Don't speak until spoken t=
o.  Don't try anything funny, unless you feel like dieing.

               =
 The Slaughter(organic) half of him hissed, as slime dripped from his mouth=
  and body.  Skulletron then began walking forward.  He slipped a gun out f=
rom a special compartment, and aimed it at Terminion's head, and then dropp=
ed his arm and gun back down to his side, and continued walking...

       =
         -------Original Message-------

                From: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com
                Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
              =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                Subject: Re: Character Debut/R=
eturn...

                The Five Felons were just strolling up when this =
incredible act happened!

                Terminion: Hello.

              =
  He got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need to.

             =
   Terminion: Hello friend.

                Junk Man wasn't used to being =
serious. Since the 5 character limit started, it was tough to survive as a =
serious character, you just got ignored.

                Junk Man: Ask him=
 what side he's on.

                Danny: No, stupid, what side are WE on=
?

                Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhead getting dec=
apitated and disemboweled...

                  ----- Original Message ----=
-
                  From: LurkerAbyss
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com
                  Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
         =
         Subject: Character Debut/Return...


                        OOC: =
 Yesss, it's here, my first character in this "restart".  God, I hate this =
damn restart.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

                        BIC=
: 

                        A deserted stretch of land.  A sky, once a brig=
ht shade of blue, was now being replaced by a quick moving area of darkness=
.  Soon, rain started to fall and showered the ground.  Thunder boomed as l=
ightning pierced the sky.  As time flew by, the storm raged on, getting mor=
e violent each minute.  The sky suddenly bloomed a dark purple.  A monstero=
us bolt of lightning struck the earth below.  The wet mud that was once dir=
t spewed through the air, as a fist plunged up from the ground!  Another st=
reak of lightning met with the fist.  There was an explosion of sparks, and=
 then the ground started to shake vigorously.  The fist started rising out =
of the ground, and revealed an arm.  The arm kept rising, and then another =
fist and arm popped out of the ground.  Soon, a head was revealed.  The fig=
ure started forcing its way out of the ground.  The storm had reached its p=
eak of brutality, destroying ground and raging on madly.  Within a matter o=
f long, never-ending minutes, the figure stood on two legs now.  The storm =
stopped just then, so suddenly.  Everything seemed to stop at that moment. =
 The rain, everything, just disappeared.  The sky was blue, the sun was bea=
ming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm as a sleeping baby.  The figure th=
at stood on the land was hideous.  It was almost two things merged into one=
.  One half was metallic, almost robotic.  The other half, was slimy, and o=
rganic, with a pincir for a hand.......

                        ENTER SKUL=
LETRON/SLAUGHTER... 
                               
                      =
 


                  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Te=
rms of Service. 



                Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to=
 the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

          Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo!=
 Terms of Service. 



        Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the =
Yahoo! Terms of Service.

EMENT

Yahoo! Terms of Service.
